name: Cornflakestein
description:
Hitler has returned! People opened a doorway to the world of Nazi flakes under the medieval castle on Mars and now people are in danger to be burnt in the concentration camp.
Arm yourself with mammary cannons and attack your enemies before they say 'Heil Hitler'!
Blow a nuclear bomb, go to the space, explore your brain and be sawn up with a power saw. All this in a very exciting old school shooter in the first person Cornflakestein!
